page.title: 07CONDITION OF FOOTPATHS.
page.content: The footpaths in the 12 km.sq. are all signposted with clear writing to indicate exactly where they are. But unfortunately this does not mean that they are{easy}to walk on. In most cases it is completely the opposite. The farmers have often{ploughed over} the footpaths which went straight across the field, so we had to walk around the outside. This is often very difficult now, mainly because the fields were ploughed right up to the fences, so we had to walk in the furrows along the edge of the fields.
